<!-- Animated Hello World -->
```{=html}
<h3 id="hello" style="margin: 0; padding: 0; outline: none;"></h3>

<script>
  var idx = 0;
  var txt = 'Hello, World!';
  var speed = 350;
  var delay = 3500;

  function typeWriter() {
    if (idx < txt.length) {
      document.getElementById("hello").innerHTML += txt.charAt(idx);
      idx++;
      setTimeout(typeWriter, speed);
    } else {
      setTimeout(resetAndTypeAgain, delay);
    }
  }

  function resetAndTypeAgain() {
    document.getElementById("hello").innerHTML = '';
    idx = 0;
    typeWriter();
  }

  // Start the typewriter effect
  window.onload = function() {
    document.getElementById("hello").innerHTML = '';
    typeWriter();
  }
</script>
```
